Question
========
In a sample of 9 persons, the mean is 3, the standard error of the mean is 0.2. Calculate the **99%** confidence level for the population mean. 

Answerlist
----------
* (2.55, 3.45)
* (2.49, 3.51)
* (2.35, 3.65)
* (2.33, 3.67)
